Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientSide.viewCore.data.dataClasses

Class ViewWorker

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientSide.viewCore.data.ViewObject
it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientSide.viewCore.data.dataClasses.ViewWorker
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientAddressable, Addressable
public class ViewWorker
extends ViewObject
Class intended to represent the Worker in the View Packace.
Author:
giorgio

    • populate

      public static ViewObject populate​(@NotNull @NotNull WorkerRemovedEvent event) throws WrongEventException
      Method that will be called on the arrival of a WorkerRemovedEvent event to build a new ViewWorker. It'll create a ViewWorker and associate it to the relative ViewPlayer.
      Parameters:
      event - (the Event arrived)
      Returns:
      (the new ViewWorker created)
      Throws:
      WrongEventException - (if there are problems creating the ViewWorker)

    • populate

      Method called with EventObject event. It'll only throw a WrongEventException (because it shouldn't be called).
      Parameters:
      event - (the EventObject event).
      Returns:
      (nothinng)
      Throws:
      WrongEventException - (always thrown).

    • populate

      public static ViewObject populate​(@NotNull @NotNull WorkerPlacedEvent workerPlaced) throws WrongEventException
      Method that will be called on the arrival of a WorkerPlacedEvent event to place a Worker. It'll create a new ViewWorker, associate it to the player and place it on the Board.
      Parameters:
      workerPlaced - (the Event arrived)
      Returns:
      (the ViewWorker placed)
      Throws:
      WrongEventException - (if there has been some errors)

    • populate

      public static ViewObject populate​(@NotNull @NotNull WorkerSelectedEvent selectedEvent) throws WrongEventException
      Method that will be called on the arrival of a WorkerSelectedEvent event . It'll search the Worker, select it and return it.
      Parameters:
      selectedEvent - (the Event arrived)
      Returns:
      (the ViewWorker selected)
      Throws:
      WrongEventException - (if there has been some errors)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      (the ViewWorker moved)

      public java.lang.String toWTerminal​(SymbolsLevel representationLevel)

    • toCLI

      public java.lang.String toCLI​(boolean head)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
